124ab8b0-218c-4fa2-9232-08def6f1d50b.description: Earners of the Basic - Online Teaching Orientation & Refresher badge have completed a seven module, fully online, asynchronous offering for Kent State faculty designed around essential online teaching topics and practices, and supports faculty from all levels of teaching experience and environments. Participants have negotiated online learning from the learner’s perspective, while exploring pertinent topics to teaching online.
124ab8b0-218c-4fa2-9232-08def6f1d50b.name: Online Teaching Orientation: Basic

badge_template_activities.title: Complete module quizzes and two Applied Practice activities.

7504387b-8228-4ac3-8c0a-f764c6d672b0.description: Kent State’s leadership program, Institute for Excellence, is one of the top programs of its kind in the country. The goal is to develop and promote a culture of excellence for faculty and staff through leadership-focused presentations, self-awareness, introspection and emotional intelligence. It has proven to be a life-changing experience that enhances social and emotional intelligence. When personal growth takes place, the result is improved performance for the individual and the university.
7504387b-8228-4ac3-8c0a-f764c6d672b0.name: Institute for Excellence Bronze Award

badge_template_activities.title: Bronze Award - Institute for Excellence graduates attending up to 30 hours of continued programming.

eed31a88-0245-418e-9004-2f675bd1a7f4.description: Earners of the Advanced - Online Teaching Orientation & Refresher badge have completed a seven module, fully online, asynchronous offering for Kent State faculty designed around essential online teaching topics and practices, and supports faculty from all levels of teaching experience and environments. Participants have negotiated online learning from the learner’s perspective, while exploring pertinent topics to teaching online.
eed31a88-0245-418e-9004-2f675bd1a7f4.name: Online Teaching Orientation: Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Complete module quizzes and five or more Applied Practice activities.

f082dd6a-3328-421b-be7c-f3c28f975b95.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Certificate in Project Management. This certificate is designed to provide professionals currently working as project managers or aspiring to take on project management responsibilities the skills needed to improve performance, provide leadership and deliver projects on time and on budget.
f082dd6a-3328-421b-be7c-f3c28f975b95.name: Certificate in Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: Essential Skills for Managing Projects (14 contact hours, 1.4 CEU)
Advanced Skills for Managing Projects (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL PROGRAM INSTEAD OF ADVANCED SKILLS: Project Leadership (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

e58e78d6-7a14-47d3-ae3b-8a34b6728dc8.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Leadership Foundations Certificate. This certificate is designed for those seeking to develop people who perform at their highest level to meet their individual goals as well as the organizational objectives. The objective of this leadership development program is to develop leaders’ skills to support succession planning and employee development activities by standardizing successful performance management throughout the organization.
e58e78d6-7a14-47d3-ae3b-8a34b6728dc8.name: Leadership Foundations Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the following eight Leadership Foundations Certificate modules (32 contact hours, 3.2 CEU):
Leadership Roles and Responsibilities: Supporting Succession Planning and Employee Development
Building Trust Through Emotional Intelligence
Communicating Effectively With Crucial Conversations and Feedback
Accountability and Change
Coaching and Empowering Your Team
Managing Conflict
Motivating and Engaging Your People
Setting Expectations and Managing Performance

c6f6917d-8117-45f3-aba0-7604261100c0.description: Lean is a method and a set of tools that focus on eliminating non-value added activities from a process. Six Sigma is a method and a set of tools, including statistical analysis, to reduce process variation. This five-day program teaches basic process improvement tools in enough detail that participants can begin to apply them immediately in their everyday work. Participants learn actual applications with worksheets, formulas and step-by-step methods based on the R-DMAIC-R roadmap.
c6f6917d-8117-45f3-aba0-7604261100c0.name: Lean Health Care Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of five days of classroom training and activities (37.5 contact hours, 3.75 CEU).
Additionally, earners of this badge successfully complete and receive certification on a Lean team project utilizing the tools provided in the training.

150517b8-b4af-4508-aff4-7618eea4b475.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Certificate of Supervision. This certificate is designed to help new and experienced supervisors develop the skills needed to be an effective frontline leader and manager.
150517b8-b4af-4508-aff4-7618eea4b475.name: Certificate of Supervision

badge_template_activities.title: Crash the Barriers: Build Your Team (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Enhancing Interpersonal Communication Skills (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Making Great Decisions (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Managing Discipline (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Motivating Employees (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Turning Conflict Into Collaboration (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

82d07eb0-fe82-4866-bd8c-1a57de69c735.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Certificate of Training and Development. This certificate is designed to teach participants the skills and knowledge necessary to design and deliver effective employee training programs.
82d07eb0-fe82-4866-bd8c-1a57de69c735.name: Certificate of Training and Development

badge_template_activities.title: Each One Teach One: Engaging Employees in Experiential Learning (14 hours, 1.4 CEU)
High-impact Learning: Fundamentals for Designing the Adult Learning Experience (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

c9af7941-b246-49f7-9cd3-8e80d6322a2a.description: Earners of this badge have attended the full Online Writing Instruction professional development series. Earners will be able to design, build, and deliver a fully-online composition course that meets current research-based best practices.
c9af7941-b246-49f7-9cd3-8e80d6322a2a.name: Online Writing Instruction Workshop Series

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Online Writing Instruction workshop series (7 hours)

cf4218a1-4eb5-4397-9976-d07770431e43.description: Earners of this badge are able to use the Backward Design model to write module-level learning outcomes and design effective assessments and content for online or hybrid delivery.
cf4218a1-4eb5-4397-9976-d07770431e43.name: Designing Your Online or Hybrid Course

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Designing Your Online or Hybrid Course workshop (3 hours)

b28604c2-f38f-447a-81ed-ab477408ceb9.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s tailored Supervisory Development Essentials Certificate. This certificate is for frontline leaders, supervisors and managers across a broad range of functional areas.
b28604c2-f38f-447a-81ed-ab477408ceb9.name: Supervision Essentials Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and complete the assignments in eight modules of Kent State’s Supervision Essentials program, which when Kent State delivers this certificate are tailored for the client organization based on the client’s competency development objectives, industry, target audience and culture. Eight, four-hour-equivalent modules targeting the needs of supervisors. Topics range from: Effective Communication to Feedback, Motivation, Coaching, Discipline and Problem Solving. 32 contact hours; 3.2 CEUs •

4d9b2a99-c92f-4238-af8c-91fd0e27c6b4.description: Earners of this badge have attended an informational presentation which covers the Kent State University at Stark roadmap from course proposal to course delivery, with considerations for getting your online or hybrid course on the schedule and a suggested timeline for each phase of developing the course. This workshop is geared to prospective online instructors and is also beneficial for departmental course coordinators.
4d9b2a99-c92f-4238-af8c-91fd0e27c6b4.name: Preparing to Teach Online

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Preparing to Teach Online workshop (45 minutes)

80d99cf4-a7aa-472e-a091-25373ea64d69.description: Earners of this badge are able to use the Kent State Online Template and universal design principles to build a modular course structure in the learning management system and build out at least one module’s content and assessments.
80d99cf4-a7aa-472e-a091-25373ea64d69.name: Building Your Online or Hybrid Course

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Building Your Online or Hybrid Course workshop (2 hours)

aba567bb-f262-408b-8159-79a1af9faadb.description: Earners of this badge have completed the full Online Teaching Introductory Series: Designing Your Online or Hybrid Course, Building Your Online or Hybrid Course, and Delivering Your Online or Hybrid Course. Earners will be able to design, build, and deliver an online or hybrid course that meets current research-based best practices.
aba567bb-f262-408b-8159-79a1af9faadb.name: Online Teaching Introductory Series

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Online Teaching Introductory workshop series (7 hours)

f4420bd9-c84e-4a5f-bff0-9575c9623d01.description: Earners of this badge are able to utilize research-based best practices for online course delivery, focusing on communicating with students, building community, providing effective and timely feedback on student work, resolving difficult situations, and monitoring student progress in the course.
f4420bd9-c84e-4a5f-bff0-9575c9623d01.name: Delivering Your Online or Hybrid Course

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Delivering Your Online or Hybrid Course workshop (2 hours)

e51be17f-5745-44d9-8b84-04798784fcc6.description: Kent State’s leadership program, Institute for Excellence, is one of the top programs of its kind in the country. The goal is to develop and promote a culture of excellence for faculty and staff through leadership-focused presentations, self-awareness, introspection and emotional intelligence. It has proven to be a life-changing experience that enhances social and emotional intelligence. When personal growth takes place, the result is improved performance for the individual and the university.
e51be17f-5745-44d9-8b84-04798784fcc6.name: Institute for Excellence Silver Award

badge_template_activities.title: Silver Award - Institute for Excellence graduates with 31 - 59 hours of continued programming.

e89454a3-e8d4-4318-aa78-11c780e550ef.description: Participants gain the skills necessary to make significant process improvements. You learn to identify waste in your processes, as well as utilize the tools and techniques needed to eliminate it. This intensive program uses a combination of practical examples and hands-on simulations to ensure that you not only learn, but also master the concepts needed to make a Lean transformation.
e89454a3-e8d4-4318-aa78-11c780e550ef.name: Lean Kent State Office Lean Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 32-40 hours of in class training
Complete a group project over the course of 120 days.  Check in with the Lean Steering Committee at 30, 60, and 90 days, as well.

470f3c74-8db0-40cd-ab4d-7f4eb5972030.description: Earners of this badge complete a detailed rubric to self-evaluate an existing online or hybrid course. Earners create a plan for improvement and prioritize their tasks.
470f3c74-8db0-40cd-ab4d-7f4eb5972030.name: Continuous Improvement in Your Online or Hybrid Course

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Continuous Improvement in Your Online or Hybrid Courses workshop (2 hours)

cd43df83-bae5-467b-9de3-2789c451bd1d.description: The Customer Service Training 1 badge is awarded to those who have learned the basic understanding of the importance of delivering excellent customer service from the Division of Information Technology. Included are learning steps that create a good service environment, knowing who the DoIT customers are and what makes them special, and recognizing barriers to delivering excellent service and how to overcome them.
cd43df83-bae5-467b-9de3-2789c451bd1d.name: Customer Service Training 1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Customer Service Training Part 1 workshop and workbook. Complete a "Practice Example" in 3-4 weeks to display active utilization of principles.
Share weekly with your immediate supervisor any customer interactions that were made better by the tools learned with this training.
Review the Customer Service Workbook twice annually to refresh, recall, and remind.

ecb83339-33e7-476e-9e9b-25468f413d67.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Certificate for Emerging Leaders. This certificate is designed to help those who have the potential and desire to be a leader or who are new to leadership roles develop the skills needed for success. The programs are designed to provide the knowledge needed to engage direct reports, drive accountability, increase financial acumen, influence colleagues and lead multigenerational teams.
ecb83339-33e7-476e-9e9b-25468f413d67.name: Certificate for Emerging Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Coaching Accountability for Impact on People and Results (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Effective Organizational Leadership: Engage and Execute (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Finance and Accounting for the Non-financial Professional – CELEMI Apples & Oranges™ (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Influencing Up (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Strategies for Leading the Multigenerational Team (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

55dfb374-4dc0-4c7b-acad-ff0e38f23254.description: Earners of this badge are able to apply research-based best practices for course design, build, and delivery specific to the hybrid format. Skills include bridging the online and face-to-face modalities, engaging students, and utilizing flipped learning strategies.
55dfb374-4dc0-4c7b-acad-ff0e38f23254.name: Best Practices for Hybrid Courses

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Best Practices for Hybrid Courses workshop (2 hours)

8e625045-d382-4996-962f-7bd0c9de8cd7.description: Earners of this badge are able to identify potential advantages and drawbacks of the Flipped Learning pedagogical model, drawing on recent scholarship and examples of successfully flipped courses. Earners are able to design a flipped lesson, and follow a process for flipping a unit or an entire course.
8e625045-d382-4996-962f-7bd0c9de8cd7.name: Introduction to Flipped Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Introduction to Flipped Learning workshop (1.5 hours)

b3a9312a-1912-4265-adc8-9cf8661ef882.description: Kent State’s leadership program, Institute for Excellence, is one of the top programs of its kind in the country. The goal is to develop and promote a culture of excellence for faculty and staff through leadership-focused presentations, self-awareness, introspection and emotional intelligence. It has proven to be a life-changing experience that enhances social and emotional intelligence. When personal growth takes place, the result is improved performance for the individual and the university.
b3a9312a-1912-4265-adc8-9cf8661ef882.name: Institute for Excellence Gold Award

badge_template_activities.title: Gold Award - Institute for Excellence graduates with 60+ hours of continued programming.

b47994a2-57a8-4622-be75-8489e3681d01.description: Lean is a method and a set of tools that focus on eliminating non-value added activities from a process. Six Sigma is a method and a set of tools, including statistical analysis, to reduce process variation. This five-day program teaches several non-statistical tools in enough detail that participants can begin to apply them immediately in their everyday work. Participants learn actual applications with worksheets, formulas and step-by-step methods based on the R-DMAIC-R roadmap.
b47994a2-57a8-4622-be75-8489e3681d01.name: Lean Higher Education Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of five days of classroom training and activities (35 contact hours, 3.5 CEU).
Additionally, earners of this badge successfully complete and receive certification on a process improvement team project utilizing the tools and presentation template provided in training.

9fbbbfdc-7976-4a4f-9591-bd491696424f.description: Supervising and managing employees is an incredibly challenging role, especially in today’s ever-changing work environment. Extraordinary demands and a wide range of expertise in competencies from communicating effectively to motivating employees to make informed decisions are needed. Kent State’s Supervision and Management Fundamentals Certificate will teach you the skills to be an effective supervisor or manager. To earn this certificate, four required and two elective programs are required.
9fbbbfdc-7976-4a4f-9591-bd491696424f.name: Supervision and Management Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Enhancing Interpersonal Communication Skills (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Motivating Employees (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Turning Conflict Into Collaboration (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Managing Discipline (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Coaching For Top Performance (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Dealing With Difficult Behaviors (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Effective Business Writing Techniques (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Lean for Frontline Supervisors (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Making Great Decisions (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Managing Transition And Embracing Change During Challenging Times (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Understanding Emotional Intelligence To Increase Your Effectiveness (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

180e4aef-acf1-4d8c-86e1-1ff6a0d24be5.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Certificate of Frontline Management. This certificate is designed to help new and experienced supervisors develop the skills needed to be an effective frontline leader and manager.
180e4aef-acf1-4d8c-86e1-1ff6a0d24be5.name: Certificate of Frontline Management

badge_template_activities.title: Crash the Barriers: Build Your Team (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Enhancing Interpersonal Communication Skills (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Making Great Decisions (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Managing Discipline (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Motivating and Engaging Employees in Today's Workplace (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Turning Conflict Into Collaboration (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

c03a7eca-2ef5-4ccd-b729-a6de2e70a979.description: Students will work in their home department with their digital leadership mentor to learn four foundational leadership power skills.
c03a7eca-2ef5-4ccd-b729-a6de2e70a979.name: Introduction to Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 4 LinkedIn DLA Power Skills Trainings in separate categories from the Power Skills Training list.
Review and apply the power skills concepts introduced in the trainings selected over the course of one semester with your department mentor.

731483ae-19f4-487f-a7c4-1c65b04721e0.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s tailored Leadership Essentials Certificate. This certificate is for supervisors and managers across a broad range of functional areas.
731483ae-19f4-487f-a7c4-1c65b04721e0.name: Leadership Essentials Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and complete the assignments in these six Kent State supervisory and management development programs, which when Kent State delivers this certificate are tailored for the client organization based on the client’s objectives, industry, target audience and culture:
Enhancing Interpersonal Communication Skills (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)
Coaching Accountability for Impact on People and Results (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)
Managing Discipline Progressively and Proactively (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)
Turning Conflict into Collaboration (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)
Motivating Employees (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)
Strategies for Leading the Multigenerational Teams (7 contact hours; 0.7 CEUs)

ebe0b7da-9c9d-47cb-bd4b-ae2dc280df33.description: Earners of this badge can apply best practices for peer reviewing a colleague’s course and follow a recommended process for communicating with the instructor, observing the class, and writing the letter. A peer review rubric for online and hybrid courses is also provided.
ebe0b7da-9c9d-47cb-bd4b-ae2dc280df33.name: Peer Reviewing Face-to-Face, Hybrid, and Online Courses

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Peer Reviewing Face-to-Face, Hybrid, and Online Courses workshop (2 hours)

5f1cdfdd-94d1-4589-9711-368b0bf3c02c.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Lean Practitioner Certification. This program is designed to teach participants the skills needed to implement a Lean initiative at their organization, lead Lean projects and apply Lean tools and principles for process improvement. Lean is a continuous improvement program designed to eliminate waste and non-value added activities in any process.
5f1cdfdd-94d1-4589-9711-368b0bf3c02c.name: Lean Practitioner Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the intensive five-day program, which uses a combination of practical examples and hands-on simulations to ensure that the participant not only learns, but also masters the concepts needed to make a Lean transformation. (35 contact hours, 3.5 CEU).
The participant must also complete and receive certification on a Lean project that is approved by one of Kent State’s Master Black Belts.

3c1f44c6-3393-42a1-a881-013dfd65c5f2.description: The Customer Service Training 2 badge is received by those learning communication tools specifically related to improving customer service and the customer experience with the Division of Information Technology.
3c1f44c6-3393-42a1-a881-013dfd65c5f2.name: Customer Service Training 2

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Customer Service Training Part 2 workshop and workbook. Complete a "Practice Example" in 3-4 weeks to display active utilization of principles.
Share weekly with your immediate supervisor any customer interactions that were made better by the tools learned with this training.
Review the Customer Service Workbook twice annually to refresh, recall, and remind.

dea676f1-c4bf-4934-a5da-4c7b63a7507c.description: Learn Apple’s customer service techniques, safety protocols for computer repair, Mac troubleshooting, how to to take apart & repair individual models of computers/laptops, how to perform diagnostics, and how to order correct parts from Apple.
dea676f1-c4bf-4934-a5da-4c7b63a7507c.name: Apple Certified Mac Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all Apple-supplied video modules for training and certification.
Demonstrate troubleshooting knowledge by running diagnostics and determining the proper solution to the issue.
Successfully take apart and reassemble at least 3 practice laptops.

e6ce73ce-053b-4809-95d0-a4ce1e26763e.description: Each year during October Cybersecurity Awareness Month the KSU IT Security Department hosts a month long cybersecurity learning event. Students will attend a cybersecurity training an participate in follow up activities to earn this introduction badge. It is easy to stay safe online. We want to remind everyone that while there are all kinds of way to keep your data protected, following just four key steps can make a big difference.
e6ce73ce-053b-4809-95d0-a4ce1e26763e.name: Introduction to Cybersecurity

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Cybersecurity Awareness Month Training.
Complete the 4 follow-up Cybersecurity Trainings actives.

a851e161-1fea-4a73-9c4f-1f2408932c0e.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Lean Practitioner Certificate. This program is designed to teach participants the skills needed to implement a Lean initiative at their organization, lead Lean projects and apply Lean tools and principles for process improvement. Lean is a continuous improvement program designed to eliminate waste and non-value added activities in any process.
a851e161-1fea-4a73-9c4f-1f2408932c0e.name: Lean Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the intensive five-day program, which uses a combination of practical examples and hands-on simulations to ensure that the participant not only learns, but also masters the concepts needed to make a Lean transformation. (35 contact hours, 3.5 CEU).

0a9b1239-4962-4a98-963d-0eabd076f667.description: Understanding of OSI model and basic troubleshooting steps within networking. Understanding Network management (Solarwinds). Troubleshooting and General understanding of Layer 2 network infrastructure at Kent State University.
0a9b1239-4962-4a98-963d-0eabd076f667.name: Network Data Services Beginner

badge_template_activities.title: Configure switches and switch ports
Participate in Network Design Discussion for future planning
Troubleshooting using knowledge of OSI model

43f7fcf2-f953-4c02-9153-eb55421f84db.description: Understanding of basic network, power, audio, and microphone issues that can be troubleshooted at the front counter.
43f7fcf2-f953-4c02-9153-eb55421f84db.name: Basic Computer Troubleshooting

badge_template_activities.title: Read internal KB articles on troubleshooting steps.
Practice troubleshooting scenarios with other front counter employees.
Assist customers at front counter under supervision of lead front counter student.

f7460d35-a06e-4f03-89ed-1247114a8e95.description: Earners of this badge brainstorm collectively on ways that tests can be used as an assessment tool in the online environment. Earners explore ways to maintain academic honesty through higher-order question design and Blackboard test settings, utilize a variety of question types, and provide constructive feedback.
f7460d35-a06e-4f03-89ed-1247114a8e95.name: Design for Online: Testing

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Design for Online: Testing workshop (1.5 hours)

e13d4327-646c-4bae-875e-dc83f930c6ae.description: This earner is proficient in basic computer repairs, and can diagnose and repair more complex computer hardware issues.
e13d4327-646c-4bae-875e-dc83f930c6ae.name: Advanced Computer Repair Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Diagnose an advanced hardware issue.
Order correct parts for the repair.
Successfully repair computer with advanced hardware issue.

35b0215b-3afa-4c24-a395-c6bac2b2ad92.description: Understanding of computer repair basics, can diagnose and repair a computer from start to finish.
35b0215b-3afa-4c24-a395-c6bac2b2ad92.name: Basic Computer Repair Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Shadow a technician performing a repair.
Diagnose a hardware issue on a computer.
Replace parts to fix hardware issue and perform all post-repair quality checks.

747f86c3-f7d8-4149-a244-26a54170ac4a.description: Earners of this badge brainstorm collectively on ways that discussion can help create that sense of community that both instructors and students value. Earners determine how to align online discussion with learning outcomes, craft effective discussion prompts, and monitor and evaluate discussions.
747f86c3-f7d8-4149-a244-26a54170ac4a.name: Design for Online: Discussions

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Design for Online: Discussions workshop (1.5 hours)

d542c699-cd4d-46bf-b484-193427f38ee5.description: Mastery of OSI model and advanced troubleshooting steps with in networking. Advanced Understanding Network management (Solarwinds). Troubleshooting and advanced understanding of Layer 2/3 network infrastructure at Kent State University
d542c699-cd4d-46bf-b484-193427f38ee5.name: Network Data Services - Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Configure switches and deploy to operational environments
Participate in Network Design Discussion for future planning
Leads and trains new students on networking the and OSI models

23218051-8b64-4cad-b81b-a4beb9c9ff8c.description: Students will learn about the IT Change Management process. They will learn how changes requests are created, approved and voted on. To earn this badge students will attend the weekly CAB meeting and be responsible for creating and posting the weekly public change report.
23218051-8b64-4cad-b81b-a4beb9c9ff8c.name: Change Management

badge_template_activities.title: Complete CAB meeting / report training with Change Coordinator
Prepare and post weekly public change report for a semester.
Work as the Change Coordinator leading the weekly CAB meeting for a period of time.

b5abda2a-883b-456a-9cb0-962db2882365.description: Learn proper Dell computer diagnostics and repair protocols, Dell-specific troubleshooting, how to process a Dell warranty claim, and how to order parts directly from Dell for in-warranty repairs.
b5abda2a-883b-456a-9cb0-962db2882365.name: Dell Authorized Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all Dell-supplied learning modules and pass the Dell Certification test.
Demonstrate troubleshooting knowledge by running diagnostics and determining the proper solution to the issue
Successfully take apart and reassemble practice laptops.

56204537-6399-4b72-9091-1fb34e3b0581.description: Learn how to image a system and troubleshoot any problems that may prevent you from imaging a system
56204537-6399-4b72-9091-1fb34e3b0581.name: Desktop Support - Computer Imaging

badge_template_activities.title: Create boot media using Rufus and image a PC. Image a MAC by enrolling into JAMF and deploying software through self service
Gather logs

1d3bbf6e-452b-4444-97c4-a33e3b0d156a.description: The Remote Support Training section deals with gaining experience with some administration tools and processes the Admin Federated Desktop Support team has. The purpose of the program is to further develop already practicing Black Belts. Master Black Belts are generally facilitators, teachers and journeyman practitioners of Lean and Six Sigma. They are efficient and effective in team facilitation and leadership. The Master Black Belt must work equally well with senior leadership and team members in order to achieve operational excellence.

Apply tools to a process or problem you are working with in another area.
Presentation to process owner, CIO, and member of PE&I team.

2bcf9744-4f0f-4586-ab31-8a25edb9b28a.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed Kent State’s Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Training and Certification program, and completed and received certification for a project. Lean Six Sigma is a continuous improvement program designed to eliminate variation in any process. The Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Training and Certification prepares participants to make an immediate impact on Six Sigma projects.
2bcf9744-4f0f-4586-ab31-8a25edb9b28a.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Training and Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of classroom training (56 contact hours, 5.6 CEUs).
The participant must also complete and receive certification on a Green Belt project that is approved by one of Kent State’s Master Black Belts.

a984d7e1-b65f-42b0-bc4a-2f18418c0abc.description: Student will practice in our Canvas Test environment before demonstrating the ability to follow complex instructions in the testing of key LMS functions after system updates and/or new technology integrations within the LMS
a984d7e1-b65f-42b0-bc4a-2f18418c0abc.name: LMS Testing

badge_template_activities.title: Able to follow complex instructions in Test environment.
Able to complete detailed instructions to adequately test functionality after changes in the environment.

f3bc431c-a5d7-405f-8cef-12e8c6f45697.description: DMCA Infringements – the ability to read logs and find the infringer. Compromised account work – and all that goes with that. Learn to create timeline for subpoenas, police and more. Learning importance of dealing with facts only (Using logs).
f3bc431c-a5d7-405f-8cef-12e8c6f45697.name: Log Analysis - Beginner

badge_template_activities.title: Work with team on a “2 sets of eyes” - they will take an infringement and find what they believe is the person and the other person does the some and compare.
Work on daily dashboards of compromises.
Will learn to use Splunk and other tools and “hunting skills” and participate on police work.

e1b8fe8a-277a-4b25-bd29-919c304d83df.description: Experiment with hyper perimeter tuning in an ML model. Test model features and select features for ML model. Translate model results into visualizations.
e1b8fe8a-277a-4b25-bd29-919c304d83df.name: Machine Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Using python ML libraries, students will create predictive ML models.
API creation for model deployment & integration.
Data cleaning in a massive data set.

0b6378ca-0fcf-4d92-825b-da18f0bb5239.description: Be able to translate customer needs into specs for complex SQL/PLSQL development. Create views or procedures to accomplish customer needs. Be able to work with customer to test and correct issues. Understand change management controls and procedures.

badge_template_activities.title: Research need, write specifications including testing plan.
Use tools (Google, mentor) to successfully return data.
Follow departmental procedures for code promotion into production environment.

49fad461-1627-4053-8d2c-aa6ca1e6ddaa.description: How to create or update a procedure and document it. Importance of documentation, written process and why they are needed. Creating handbooks of procedures and processes to teach others.
49fad461-1627-4053-8d2c-aa6ca1e6ddaa.name: Security Procedure Documentation - Beginner

Work on October Cyber Security month.

d70a1238-9aad-46a7-b0f1-443eb6e963ba.description: Earners have developed skills to understand and develop highly complex custom web and mobile applications. They are able to make complex updates to existing applications and develop design specs and new applications based on requirements given to them from customers. They work in a team environment, participate in team discussions, code review sessions, group troubleshooting, team scrums and customer presentations and assist in reviewing code and testing beginner developers work.
d70a1238-9aad-46a7-b0f1-443eb6e963ba.name: Software Developer - Master

badge_template_activities.title: Create a custom web or mobile application of advanced complexity.
Create technical application documentation after a brief intro of what the application does.
Participate in code reviews.

2c034703-8d59-4275-bc38-4f92e5089a17.description: This new certificate builds on the skills you learn in the Fundamentals certificate and will take your supervision and management to even higher levels. To earn Kent State’s Supervision and Management Advanced Certificate, first complete Kent State’s Supervision and Management Fundamentals Certificate. You must also complete the three required core programs plus, complete any two of the following electives not previously taken in the Supervision and Management Fundamentals Certificate.
2c034703-8d59-4275-bc38-4f92e5089a17.name: Supervision and Management Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: CELEMI Agile Move™ (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Finance And Accounting For The Non-Financial Professional - CELEMI Virtual Apples And Oranges™ (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
Effective Performance Management For Managers And Supervisors (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Coaching For Top Performance (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Dealing With Difficult Behaviors (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Effective Business Writing Techniques (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Lean for Frontline Supervisors (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Making Great Decisions (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Managing Transition And Embracing Change During Challenging Times (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)
OPTIONAL: Understanding Emotional Intelligence To Increase Your Effectiveness (7 contact hours, 0.7 CEU)

b4dd5dd8-4649-4cbf-8acd-34946305b7bf.description: Learn the role of UX in the IT project life cycle. Understand how to apply UX design concepts to application development in an IT team setting. Develop communication skills through presenting personal work to teammates and clients.

09956829-50b6-41fd-8406-c325c453cb43.description: Understand propagation from Wireless Access Point, WiFi ranges, and RF propagation. Understand wireless network management. Troubleshoot wireless connection/access issues.
